programmes.show_description: On the eve of her sister's wedding, real estate agent Lisa must decide if developer Matthew Wallace holds the key to her heart. (2021)
When the older brother of the bride catches perpetual bridesmaid Cate's eye, she must choose between fanning old flames and lighting new ones. (2021)
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
An aspiring romance novelist wonders if she has been writing the wrong kinds of stories when she is shown the beauty of nature by a charming hotel owner on a retreat. (2022)
A crime series actress returns to her home town where she encounters her first real case. Can her TV crime knowledge save the day? Mystery drama with Lyndie Greenwood. (2024)
Theme Park performer Lacey becomes friends with eight-year-old princess Rose and is swept up in the royal world of luxury and nobility. Nichole Sakura stars. (2025)
Surprises are in store for Ilana when she travels to Santorini with her Greek boyfriend Mike for a family wedding. (2023)
Single chef Lidia sees her future plans fall apart when arrogant tech innovator Danny buys her restaurant and plans to completely remodel it. Can she convince him that less is more? (2023)
A single mother, surprised by her daughter's recent engagement, travels to the Gulf Shores where she unexpectedly finds love. (2023)
When Naima meets Damian after her interest in an undiscovered music group brings her to Nashville, their shared love of music blossoms into something more. (2023)
Having given up on searching for the man of her dreams, Harriet is transported into the world of Pride and Prejudice to find one. No man can compare to Mr Darcy - can they? (2024)
Contest winners try to solve a fake murder for a grand prize, but the event goes awry when a real murder occurs and secrets are uncovered. Cozy crime thriller. (2025)
After their children get into a fight at school, a competitive single mum and stubborn single dad are both roped in to producing the school's play - Romeo and Juliet. (2022)
Things get complicated for rich-girl wannabe-writer Paige when she decides to submit her writings under a pseudonym to the publishing company that her mum is about to tear apart. (2023)

When a celebrity chef walks off his show, prep cook Anna must step into the spotlight and make the show her own, with the help of her Aussie cameraman and Portuguese location scout. (2023)
When a book editor helps a mystery writer add a romantic skew to his novel, their fictional love story falls of the pages and into the real world. (2022)
Struggling to save her farm, a woman enters a floral design contest, where she develops a blossoming romance with a local pastor. (2023)
When Lolly's Aunt Gert gives her three magical lemon drops, she gets to experience what her life would have been like if she had lived her unfulfilled dreams. (2023)
Lawyers Mark and Dana are the perfect married couple... until they find themselves on opposite sides of a highly public divorce case involving a warring reality show couple. (2023)
As the Easter holiday approaches, a woman rediscovers a blessing bracelet that helps restore her faith and renew her belief in love. (2023)
Redeeming Major League Baseball pitcher Diego's damaged reputation is a great career opportunity for publicist Hazel, but it's complicated: she and Diego have a past. (2023)
Ella agrees to go on honeymoon with her pal Lindsey after being jilted at the altar. But Lindsey finds love on the trip and is forced hide the holiday romance from her best friend. (2023)
On the brink of losing her job, a relationship columnist takes a bet with a self-proclaimed matchmaker who guarantees to find her perfect match. (2023)
